rdf:Description.dc:title: No time to spare 1988
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Heather, Jane.
Selman, Jan.
Alberta Alcohol and Drug Abuse Commission.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton] : Alberta Alcohol and Drug Abuse Commission (AADAC),
rdf:Description.dc:description: Cover title: No time to spare : a theatre project for seniors.
Includes script of play and suggestions for use. Video also available from AADAC which documents creation and production of play. --Introd.
Theme of play: "What does it take for seniors to lead fulfilled and positive lives". --Introd.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Older people.
Older people
Theater and older people.
